txt.en:
'The stable-boy is returning, which pleases me. It means that we have a chance to renew the stable's business. The next step is obtain supplies for the horses.

'The boy will take care of getting everything straightened back up. I dare not send him into the fields to gather more supplies, though, and we are in desperate need of hay. Yes, there are no horses to feed, but without food you cannot have any horses.

'The fields of the moors to the east have some hay-stalks in them that were not gathered for harvest. If you can bring several of them back, then the only thing left to do will be to get the actual horses.'
'This will do perfectly. Now, to find ourselves some horses!'
'You can find the hay to the east of here.'
The stables of Avardin have been in turmoil as of late. Lack of money, supplies, and storms have all contributed to the stables being shuttered.
Hay can be found to the east of Avardin.\n\nLevelha has asked you to collect hay for the horses.
Bring the hay to Levelha in Avardin
Levelha is in Avardin, in the central Starkmoor.\n\nLevelha will be pleased to see you have brought the hay back.
